'''Alpha v1.0.3'''<ref>[[wordofnotch:781975830|Multiplayer progress update, and Minecraft Alpha 1.0.3]] – The Word of Notch, July 7, 2010</ref><ref>{{ytl|DkOFlTnIEKA|Minecraft Mine Shaft Mine Cart System|thatGUYbehindthemask|July 8, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 7, 2010 to add new [[sound]]s and to change the behavior of [[mob]]s.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Diamond Axe JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Hoe JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Shovel JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Sword JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Diamond]] [[axe]], [[hoe]], [[pickaxe]], [[shovel]] and [[sword]]'''
* Durability has been increased from 513 to 1025.

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* Pathfinding has been improved on hills.
** Only exception is for [[spider]]s.
* Generally more convincing mob idling behavior. 
** They stand still more often, looking around at their surroundings.
